articles.author: Mack DeGeurin
articles.title: 'Invasive' Google Keyword Search Warrants Get Court Greenlight, Here's Everything You Need to Know
articles.description: Colorado’s Supreme Court this week had the opportunity to hand down a historic judgment on the constitutionality of “reverse keyword search warrants,” a powerful new surveillance technique that grants law enforcement the ability to identify potential criminal…
